member.name: T:Helpers.console1ProgramConfig
member.summary: Command-line parameters for this particular (easyam) program

member.name: T:Helpers.ConfigEntry`1
member.summary: Parameterized type to allow command-line argument processing without a lot of extra coder work Instantiate the type with the type of value you want. Make a default entry in case nothing is found Then call the populate method. Will pull from args and return a val and args with the found value (if any consumed)

member.name: M:Helpers.copyToDestinationDirectory(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: OS-independent file copy from one place to another. Uses shell.
